instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: [SOLVED]MacBook Air 820-2838 battery charging.
threads.message:
Hello, I need help to solve this.

Macbook works from charger, no charger light. also works from battery. but do not show any life when battery and charger both plugged in. Board looks like new.

threads.title: [SOLVED]MacBook Air 820-2838 battery charging.
threads.message: Need to get green light first. The usual question: known good IO board and flat cable?

threads.title: [SOLVED]MacBook Air 820-2838 battery charging.
threads.message: yes IO board solved my problems.
